_header: Jesu have mercy upon us and this English nation
_description: Prayer for England as part of Christendom — one couplet in long lines

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Ihesus haue mercy vpppon vs and this Inglishe nacyonwhich hath bneof
                    crists flock an habitacion
DULCosViii9.Note:
Added to top margin with heading ‘Ihesus’
                    above.
